description: Oracle Primavera is an enterprise-level project management program that allows project managers to design, schedule, and analyze projects. Project managers in various industries, like engineering and construction, often use the software. Oracle acquired Primavera from Primavera Systems in 2008.

Primavera initially developed the XER format, releasing it with its Eagle Ray software ("XER" is short for "eXchange Eagle Ray"). After Oracle acquired Primavera in 2008, it integrated support for the XER format in Primavera, enabling the software to export and import project information in the format.
